snippet.title: Secret Agent HD Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now, Secret Agent HD remasters the original three episodes of Secret Agent for modern resolutions and marks the world premiere of Secret Agent Episode 4, a brand-new collection of missions starring Agent 006.

Secret Agent casts players as Agent 006, a wholly original spy with a penchant for saving the world. In this 2D adventure, 006 must prevent a global catastrophe by parachuting into a high-security island to retrieve top-secret superweapon plans from the Diabolical Villain Society (DVS). At every turn, 006 must avoid perilous traps, sleuth his way through dastardly puzzles, and sneak past the DVS.

Secret Agent HD offers updated visuals across all three original episodes, a brand-new original soundtrack, and 16 never-before-played missions in Secret Agent Episode 4, exclusive to this remaster. Challenge friends with custom levels using the built-in level editor and Steam Workshop integration. Claim retro street cred with full leaderboard support. Hear a brand-new original soundtrack, test your mettle against seven new enemies, find a new secret level, wield fresh power-ups, and more.

Available Now on Steam and GoG Galaxy!

DISCORD: https://dsc.gg/apogee
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/apogee_ent
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/ApogeeEnt/
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/apogeeentertainment/


————————————
Video Credits:

Produced and Directed by Jeron Moore and Primož Vovk
Edited by Jeron Moore
Original Music Composed by Chapman Hammond  
Guitar Arranged, Performed, and Recorded by Chapman Hammond
